title: A Two Parameter Family of the Calabi-Yau d-Fold
abstract: We study a two parameter family of Calabi-Yau d-fold by means of mirror symmetry. We construct mirror maps and calculate correlation functions associated with {\kae} moduli in the original manifold. We find there are more complicated instanton corrections of these couplings than threefolds, which is expected to reflect families of instantons with continous parameters.
